directions: Preheat oven to 425°. Toss cauliflower and 4 Tbsp. oil on a rimmed baking sheet; season with salt and pepper. Roast, tossing occasionally, until tender and golden brown, 25–30 minutes.

Meanwhile, pulse parsley, lemon juice, and remaining 2 Tbsp. oil in a food processor until very finely chopped; season with salt and pepper. Toss cauliflower with lemon-parsley mixture and top with lemon zest.
ingredients: 2 heads cauliflower (about 2 lb) cut into florets, including tender leaves
short_desc: Great recipe, make sure you get twice as much cauliflower as you think you need. Be care not to add too much oil while roasting
title: Roasted Cauliflower with Lemon-Parsely Dressing
